Centre de préparation aux concours natio: Training center for national and international competitive exams in Cameroon. Succeed in your exams and obtain scholarships through our intensive and personalized training programs.
Programmes adaptés pour vous préparer au: Tailored programs to prepare you for national and international competitive exams
Préparation aux concours de la fonction: Preparation for civil service exams such as ENAM, IRIC, ISSEA, Police, Gendarmerie, and more.
Préparation aux concours d'entrée: Polyt: Preparation for entrance exams: Polytechnic, ENSTP, ESSEC, UCAC, ENSP, IUT and more.
Préparation aux examens et constitution: Exam preparation and application assistance for scholarships: DAAD, Fulbright, Chevening, Campus France.
Préparation intensive aux examens offici: Intensive preparation for official exams: BEPC, Probatoire, Baccalauréat, BTS and Bachelor's degree.
Préparation aux tests standardisés: TOEF: Preparation for standardized tests: TOEFL, IELTS, SAT, GRE, GMAT, TCF and TEF.
Cours intensifs et coaching personnalisé: Intensive courses and personalized coaching for students with specific needs and special constraints.
Une approche pédagogique efficace pour u: An effective pedagogical approach for a high success rate
Cours méthodiques avec des supports péda: Methodical courses with comprehensive teaching materials adapted to each program.
Classes limitées à 15-20 élèves pour gar: Classes limited to 15-20 students to ensure personalized attention and better follow-up.
Tests hebdomadaires et examens blancs po: Weekly tests and mock exams to measure progress and identify areas for improvement.
Professeurs expérimentés, souvent membre: Experienced professors, often exam board members and specialists in their fields.
Taux de réussite supérieur à 92% dans to: Success rate higher than 92% in all our programs
Plus de 15 ans d'expérience dans la prép: More than 15 years of experience in exam preparation
Suivi personnalisé et soutien académique: Personalized follow-up and continuous academic support
Réseau d'anciens élèves actifs et entrai: Network of active alumni and community support
Inscrivez-vous dès maintenant pour bénéf: Register now to benefit from our special offer
Pour toute inscription avant le 30 du mo: For all registrations before the 30th of the month
Présents dans les principales villes du: Present in the main cities of Cameroon to be closer to you
Notre centre principal situé au cœur de: Our main center located in the heart of the capital with complete facilities.
Notre centre économique avec des espaces: Our economic center with modern and well-equipped spaces.
Notre centre dans l'ouest du pays, facil: Our center in the western part of the country, easily accessible and well-equipped.
Nous disposons également de centres à Ba: We also have centers in Bamenda, Buea, Garoua, Limbé, Maroua, Ngaoundéré, Bertoua, and Ebolowa. Contact us for more information about the center nearest to you.
Ce que disent nos étudiants qui ont réus: What our students who have passed their exams say
Trouvez des réponses aux questions les p: Find answers to the most common questions about our programs
Comment s'inscrire à une formation à ICO: How to register for a program at ICORP?
Pour vous inscrire à une formation, vous: To register for a program, you can:
Visiter l'un de nos centres et vous insc: Visit one of our centers and register directly on site
Remplir le formulaire de contact sur not: Fill out the contact form on our website
Nous appeler aux numéros indiqués: Call us at the numbers indicated
Nous envoyer un email à info@icorp-educa: Send us an email at info@icorp-education.cm
Après votre préinscription, un conseille: After your pre-registration, an educational advisor will contact you to finalize your registration and provide you with all the necessary information.
Nous acceptons plusieurs modes de paieme: We accept several payment methods to facilitate your registration:
Paiement par Mobile Money (Orange Money,: Payment by Mobile Money (Orange Money, MTN Mobile Money, etc.)
Des facilités de paiement peuvent être a: Payment facilities can be granted depending on your situation. Do not hesitate to contact us to discuss it.
Quels documents faut-il fournir pour s'i: What documents are required to register?
Les documents à fournir varient selon la: The documents to be provided vary according to the chosen program, but generally you must present:
Une copie de votre pièce d'identité ou a: A copy of your ID card or birth certificate
Une copie de votre dernier diplôme obten: A copy of your last obtained diploma
Un dossier d'inscription dûment rempli (: A duly completed registration file (available in our centers or downloadable on our website)
Des documents supplémentaires peuvent êt: Additional documents may be requested depending on the type of training or competition targeted.
Oui, ICORP propose des formations à dist: Yes, ICORP offers distance learning for most of its programs:
Cours en ligne via notre plateforme d'ap: Online courses via our learning platform
Cours par visioconférence en direct avec: Live video conference courses with our trainers
Supports de cours numériques et exercice: Digital course materials and interactive exercises
Nos formations à distance sont conçues p: Our distance learning programs are designed to be as complete and effective as our in-person training, with regular support and frequent evaluations.
Quelles sont les dates de début des form: What are the start dates for the programs?
Les dates de début de nos formations son: The start dates of our programs are flexible and adapt to the calendar of competitions and exams:
Pour les concours administratifs: généra: For administrative competitions: generally from September to January
Pour les grandes écoles: d'octobre à mar: For graduate schools: from October to March
Pour les examens officiels: tout au long: For official exams: throughout the academic year
Pour les formations aux tests internatio: For international test training: monthly sessions
Nous organisons également des sessions d: We also organize intensive training sessions during school holidays. Contact us to find out the exact dates of the next sessions of the training that interests you.
Prêt à réussir vos concours et examens?: Ready to succeed in your competitive exams?
Rejoignez les milliers d'étudiants qui o: Join the thousands of students who have trusted ICORP for their preparation. Our qualified trainers and proven method will help you achieve your goals.
ICORP est le leader camerounais de la pr: ICORP is the Cameroonian leader in exam preparation with more than 15 years of experience and an exceptional success rate.
